amendment.description: To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement through 2011.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3013 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 38.

action.text: Amendment SA 3013 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S2056-2062, S2091-2092; text: CR S2056) To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement through 2011.
